name: Chole Bhature
instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight and cook. Prepare onion-tomato gravy with spices, add chickpeas. For bhatura, knead flour with yogurt, rest, and deep-fry.

name: Masala Dosa
instructions: Soak and ferment rice & dal batter. Cook dosa on a tawa. Prepare potato masala with onion, chili, curry leaves. Fill dosa with masala.

name: Gulab Jamun
instructions: Knead dough with milk powder, flour, and ghee. Fry small balls until golden. Soak in sugar syrup flavored with cardamom and rose water.

name: Sambar Rice
instructions: Cook rice and dal together. Prepare tamarind extract with vegetables and sambar powder. Mix rice and dal with the sambar. Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

name: Keerai Rice (Spinach Rice)
instructions: Cook rice separately. Sauté chopped spinach with onion, chili, cumin, and garlic. Mix spinach masala into rice. Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

name: Vegetable Biryani
instructions: Sauté onion, ginger-garlic paste, and tomato with spices. Add vegetables and yogurt. Layer with half-cooked rice. Cook on dum until flavors blend.

name: Ven Pongal
instructions: Cook rice and moong dal until soft. Fry ginger, chili, pepper, curry leaves, and cashews in ghee. Mix seasoning into rice-dal mixture.

name: Upma
instructions: Roast rava until golden. In another pan, sauté onion, chili, ginger, curry leaves, and cashews. Add water, salt, and roasted rava. Stir until thick.

name: Peanut Chutney
instructions: Roast peanuts, chili, and garlic. Grind into smooth paste with water. Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

name: Coconut Chutney
instructions: Grind coconut, chili, ginger, and roasted chana dal into a paste. Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

name: Tomato Chutney
instructions: Sauté tomato, onion, chili, and garlic. Grind to smooth paste. Temper with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

name: Potato Chutney
instructions: Boil potatoes and mash. Sauté onion, chili, ginger, and curry leaves. Blend with mashed potatoes into a chutney. Temper with mustard seeds.

name: Idli
instructions: Soak rice, dal, and fenugreek. Grind into batter and ferment overnight. Steam batter in idli molds until soft and fluffy.

name: Aloo Paratha
instructions: Boil and mash potatoes with spices. Stuff into dough balls, roll into flatbreads, and cook with ghee on a tawa.

name: Rajma Chawal
instructions: Soak rajma overnight and cook. Prepare onion-tomato gravy with spices, add rajma. Serve with steamed rice.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
instructions: Cook onion and tomato with spices. Blend into smooth gravy. Add paneer cubes, butter, and cream. Simmer until rich and creamy.

name: Chapati with Vegetable Curry
instructions: Prepare soft chapati dough, roll and cook on a tawa. Make mixed vegetable curry with onion-tomato base. Serve together.

name: Curd Rice
instructions: Mash cooked rice and mix with curd. Temper with chili, ginger, curry leaves, and mustard seeds. Chill before serving.

name: Poori with Potato Masala
instructions: Knead dough with wheat flour and deep-fry into puffed pooris. Make potato masala with onion, chili, curry leaves, and spices. Serve hot.

name: Fish Curry
instructions: Make tamarind-based gravy with onion, tomato, and spices. Add fish pieces and simmer until cooked. Finish with curry leaves and coconut oil.
